A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Very disjointed from TFA. The plot contained many pointless subterfuges. It's almost as if Disney decided which action scenes\, cast and shooting locations they wanted and *then* wrote the plot to string it all together. I very much prefer TFA to this one. Humor was ok\, but it removed from the insidious (see what I did there) feel of the bad guys. Why bother hyping up the good guys if the bad guys suck?
